name: OpenGuardrails
description: Agent-based prompt injection detection for long content using LLM analysis

enabled.description: Enable or disable the guard (default: true)

blockOnRisk.description: Block tool calls when injection is detected (default: true)

maxChunkSize.description: Maximum characters per chunk for analysis (default: 4000)

overlapSize.description: Overlap between chunks to catch split attacks (default: 200)

dbPath.description: Path to SQLite database for logging (default: ~/.openclaw/openclawguard.db)

enabled.label: Enable Guard
enabled.help: Enable or disable prompt injection detection

maxChunkSize.label: Chunk Size

overlapSize.label: Chunk Overlap
overlapSize.help: Characters of overlap between chunks to catch split attacks
